content: Nara, nara, nara, aja biko Chukwu,
Aja anyi n'erunyere Gi maka ndi enyi du na ndi nwuru anwu,
Ka aja nke a anyi ji akwu ugwo mmehie,
Meda Gi obi maka njo anyi.
O Chukwu, anyi ndu-ario ka I were ebere,
Gi ma kaezumike na nzoputa Nwaodibo Gi.
Nye Ya onodu ebebe n'etiti ndi nke Gi,
Azoputa goro, nuru nuru aririo anyi.
Oh, Oh! Nara nu onyinye anyi, Oh Chukwu!
